reviewComments: The staff at Peaches and Cream Day Spa are wonderful and the services truly make you feel pampered. Stop by and enjoy the great variety of services offered at the Spa.
The Haugh Center presents a wonderful variety of top notch performers including professionals and Citrus College students in a great venue at affordable prices!
The Haugh Performing Center at Citrus College is simply a great little theater. Comfortable seating, wide isles, and good views of the stage.

A beautiful drive with lots of pull outs and views. For those of you who get car sick, LOTS of turns! Great place to watch 4th of July fireworks.
